BodyName: Subcommittee on Planning, Dispositions and Concessions

Items.Title: Application No. 20165373 HAK submitted by New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development pursuant to Section 577 of the Private Housing Finance Law for an amendment to a previously approved real property tax exemption for property located at 332 Bergen Street (Block 389, Lot 22), Borough of Brooklyn, Community Board 2, Council District 33.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Planning, FIFTH AVENUE COMMITTEE RENAISSANCE, 332 Bergen St, Brooklyn (20165373 HAK)

Items.Title: Application No. 20165374 HAK submitted by New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development pursuant to Article 16 of the General Municipal Law for an amendment to a previously approved urban development action area project for property located at 163 Columbia Street (Block 319, Lot 12), Borough of Brooklyn, Community Board 6, Council District 39.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Approved by Subcommittee approved by Roll Call.
